text_block_list.text:
One afternoon, I get a notification on my 
phone, so I take a look, and――
Horseshoes: found―!!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Wait! Bakushin O-senpaaai―……!
(Thud!!)
――A tremendous crash assaulted my back!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Aaaah～! I apologize for the abruptness of 
my assault! Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Please forgive her! My senpai only did it 
because her righteous heart is burning 
to catch this criminal…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
My classmate's horseshoe has been stolen! 
As the class president, I cannot turn a 
blind eye!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
The same thing is happening all over 
school… I, too, as a hero of justice, am 
pursuing the culprit!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Stealing horseshoes, that crow!
choice_data_list: Was I just mistaken for a crow…?
Was I just mistaken for a crow…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No, no, no! Not at all! 
That phone, it looked like the stolen 
horseshoe…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Just now! Compleeetely! 
I forgot that the culprit was a crow!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Howeeeeever! Next time, without fail, I'll 
get the horseshoe back from that cro――
(Kaaaaack! Caaaw!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There it is! A crow with a horseshoe in its 
mouth! 
This time, in the name of the class 
president, I shall capture you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You can't escaaaaaape!!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Horseshoes and… huh? 
This menko, the one I lost and was looking 
for…!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
Aahh!? There's my hoof hammer, too! 
It was just the crows' doing…! 
Thank goodness!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
That crow was the school's great thief! 
That's amazin', Bakushin O-senpai!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fu-fu-fu! Isn't it!? 
This is――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The Bakushin-esque power of the class 
president!

text_block_list.name: Classmates
text_block_list.text:
As expected, Bakushi―n! 
That's our class president～～!

Sakura Bakushinoh's fame was further 
enhanced!

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Thanks, class president! 
For getting my horseshoe back!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Those crows were shakin' in their boots so 
bad, they must have changed their minds! 
Now we've successfully kept the peace at 
the school!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, no, this is nothing! With my superb 
swiftness, I can do this stuff without 
breaking a sweat!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Please do keep counting on me for 
anything at all, one thing after the other!

Sakura Bakushin O's class was excited by 
her success.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Whhaaaah―!? 
Being able to fly isn't fair―!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Uuuugh… I missed. 
I should have polished up on my Bakushin 
more…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
However, if I simply give up like this, I'll 
ruin my reputation as class president! 
What should I do!
choice_data_list: We'll use traps to lure them out.

text_block_list.text:
Earlier, she said "I mistook a horseshoe for 
a cell phone." 
…Using what she said as a hint, I set up a 
phone as a decoy――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hiyaaaaah――!!

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Thanks, class president! 
For getting my horseshoe back!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Those crows were shakin' in their boots so 
bad, they must have changed their minds! 
Now we've successfully kept the peace at 
the school!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, I'd like to thank you, too! 
This has been a great learning experience!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Not only must I Bakushin… 
It's also quite necessary to work out a plan!

While she regretted that she couldn't solve 
the problem, she seemed to have made a 
new discovery.
